ThingDef.label: Springfield Model 2020 Waypoint
ThingDef.description: A modern design of precision hunting rifle. Bolt action. It has an exceptionally long range, great accuracy and good power. Because it's so unwieldy, other weapons outclass it at close range.

ThingDef.label: Springfield Model 2020 Redline
ThingDef.description: A modern design of precision hunting rifle. Bolt action. It has an exceptionally long range, great accuracy and good power. Because it's so unwieldy, other weapons outclass it at close range.

ThingDef.label: L42A1
ThingDef.description: A bolt-action sniper rifle, and the final evolution of the Lee-Enfield Rifle. Has a simple non-adjustable scope.

ThingDef.label: Azrael PRS
ThingDef.description: A modern design of precision hunting rifle. Bolt action. It has an exceptionally long range, great accuracy and good power. Because it's so unwieldy, other weapons outclass it at close range.

ThingDef.label: Howa Model 1500
ThingDef.description: A traditional design of precision hunting rifle. Bolt action. It has an exceptionally long range, great accuracy and good power. Because it's so unwieldy, other weapons outclass it at close range.

ThingDef.label: Barrett MRAD
ThingDef.description: A very large precision bolt-action rifle made for sniping at extreme ranges. It features a folding stock to ease some of the bulk.

ThingDef.label: Savage 25 Walking Varminter
ThingDef.description: A bolt-action varmint rifle, with a low power scope. Relatively lightweight, but low range.

ThingDef.label: Remington M700 ADL
ThingDef.description: An iconic bolt-action hunting rifle, available in many variants. Its many years of development have given it a reputation for great reliability and precision, despite its simple operation.

ThingDef.label: Remington M700 BDL
ThingDef.description: An iconic bolt-action hunting rifle, available in many variants. Its many years of development have given it a reputation for great reliability and precision, despite its simple operation.

ThingDef.label: Remington M700 CDL
ThingDef.description: An iconic bolt-action hunting rifle, available in many variants. Its many years of development have given it a reputation for great reliability and precision, despite its simple operation.

ThingDef.label: Remington M700 CDL SF
ThingDef.description: An iconic bolt-action hunting rifle, available in many variants. Its many years of development have given it a reputation for great reliability and precision, despite its simple operation. Chambered for the more powerful .30-06 Springfield cartridge.

ThingDef.label: Remington M700 SPS
ThingDef.description: An iconic bolt-action hunting rifle, available in many variants. Its many years of development have given it a reputation for great reliability and precision, despite its simple operation.

ThingDef.label: Remington M700 SPS Tactical
ThingDef.description: An iconic bolt-action hunting rifle, available in many variants. Its many years of development have given it a reputation for great reliability and precision, despite its simple operation.

ThingDef.label: Remington M700 SPS Tactical Threaded
ThingDef.description: An iconic bolt-action hunting rifle, available in many variants. Its many years of development have given it a reputation for great reliability and precision, despite its simple operation. Fitted with a suppressor.

ThingDef.label: SIG Cross
ThingDef.description: A modern design of precision hunting rifle. Bolt action, fitted with a highly advanced digital scope with night vision capabilities.

ThingDef.label: Q The Fix
ThingDef.description: Very light and compact bolt-action rifle, chambered for the heavy 8.6mm Blackout cartridge. Very high lethality in a small package; the downside is its decreased effectiveness at long ranges.

ThingDef.label: Barrett M82A1
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle. Uses a high-magnification scope to snipe heavy equipment at extreme range.

ThingDef.label: Barrett M107A1
ThingDef.description: Upgraded variant of the classic M82 anti-materiel rifle. Fitted with a top-mounted ballistic calculator and a prominent suppressor/muzzle brake.

ThingDef.label: AK-50
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle. Uses a high-magnification scope to snipe heavy equipment at extreme range. Fitted with an advanced scope which makes precision shots easier.

ThingDef.label: Serbu RN-50
ThingDef.description: A simple single-shot anti-materiel rifle. Very lightweight and relatively compact compared to other rifles of its kind. Comes with a quick detachable stock for ease of transport.

ThingDef.label: Tyrannosaurus
ThingDef.description: A specialty made breech-loading rifle chambered for a ridiculously oversized cartridge.
